quotes.quote: At sunrise, the blue sky paints herself with gold colors and joyfully dances to the music of a morning breeze.
Because gray clouds hang heavy with misery, blue skies seem bluer.
Cloud above cloud, a glorious sight, contrasting with the deep-blue sky!
He battles heart and arm, his own blue sky above him, and his own green land around.
Within the sun-lit forest, our roof the bright blue sky, where fountains flow, and wild flowers blow, we lift our hearts on high.
I never get tired of the blue sky.
If the sight of the blue skies fills you with joy, rejoice, for your soul is alive.
Staring at the blue sky causes insomnia to occur in the human.
Beauty is and always will be blue skies and open highway.
I love to soar in the boundless sky. In the vast emptiness of the blue, my soul rejoices listening to the soundless music of the wind.
See the golden beach sands and blue sky in a cool breeze my mind flys high
I wanted to kiss you like the waves kiss the shore under the blue sky.
It would appear that the blue sky is actually produced by the solar wind and solar radiation exciting air molecules to emit light, just like a neon lamp!

Today I spoke to you again and I feel completely happy! I feel like a cloud floating around in the wide blue sky. I feel totally alive. I feel as if time has paused in this moment. As if God is telling me to be totally happy and cheerful!
Complete people gaze into the blue sky above, plunge into the center of the earth below, and run freely in the eight directions without even a change of mood.
You're looking up, at a yellow sun, in the middle of a dark, dark blue sky. A warm summer breeze... blows across your face. White clouds streak across the dark blue sky. What do you see there?
Everyone can enjoy the blue sky. The world is fair.
Smell that fresh morning air! Look at the blue sky above!
I'm a happy camper, I love the clear blue sky, and with the grace of God, I'll camp until I die!
You will see the blue sky spreading endlessly above you and smiling down.
When you fall over, make the most of the chance to look up and see the sky.
Wait, that doesn't look like Earth. Where's the blue sky? Where's the-the grass?
Yes. I imagined the cool, clean air and this huge, perfect blue sky all around me.
If you should stop pushing clouds, the blue sky would swallow you up like a starving monster.
I do. It feels like how being in love should be. Floating through a dark blue sky.
I hate nothing more than lies - wasted words, clouds that darken the blue sky yet bring no relief of rain.
Live by the laws of the Blue Sky and you will follow in the steps of your father, who follows in mine.

The important things haven't changed. There's still the same painted blue sky and and artificial trees. white birds on a brilliant rainbow purified water on man-made flowers the orange sun filtered through acid-free air,warming our beautiful world.
I want to believe that. Just as the rain will eventually stop and reveal a blue sky that we both can see.
When the rain is falling / There's no silver lining / And you just can't seem to find the light / When you need a reason / To help you keep believing / Let my love be your blue sky
I burn all my loneliness under the ocean / Wash away fears and I / I'm sending all my love to the blue skies / When light is raining over me
When a rose make my tears roll down / Nothing better than a blue sky / To cry over my memories
Blue skies smiling at me / Nothing but blue skies do I see / Bluebirds singing a song / Nothing but blue skies from now on
When you're in love, my how they fly by / Blue days, all of them gone / Nothing but blue skies from now on
And I can't seem to find my feet now / Somebody help me please / Sunshine, sunshine / I wanna see the blue sky
See how the sun shines brightly in the city / On the streets where once was pity / Mr. Blue Sky is living here today, hey hey
Hey you with the pretty face / Welcome to the human race / A celebration, Mr. Blue Sky's up there waiting / And today is the day we've waited for
Blue skies and summer life / And summer light / Blue skies and summer life / Take an effect / See the blue skies from the outside
Blue skies, blue skies / Smiling at me now, how now / Nothing but blue skies do I see / Spring is here, Spring is here,
When you're in love, my, my how they fly. / Blue days, all of them gone now / I see only blues skies, blues skies
I won't cry if it won't last forever / I'll just try to hold on / There will be sunshine after the rain / There will be blue sky's coming, blue sky's coming
I'm seeing pink cause I've been looking at the bright side / I ain't letting nobody cloud up all my blue sky
Everybody's looking for a blue sky / Searching for an answer on a satellite / I know that there's got to be a blue sky out there to see / A blue sky waiting for me
Blue skies, setting sun / cherry pie, bubble gum / lullabies to be sung / blue skies for everyone
Blue skies, blue skies / Not a cloud over head in my life / When it's gray out I don't mind / I've got blue skies on the inside
Clear blue skies, not too much to ask for, / They were here before we came, / Will they be here when we're gone?
Mother Nature sits on the other side with a loaded gun / Why is there blue sky / Why is there red sky / Now's the time to ask the reason
Tall trees in a blue sky / Stand together don't ask why / Stretch up to the blue sky / Pierce that ceiling if you try
And blue skies and sunshine you gotta give respect to get respect / You know / Blue skies, sunshine / What a day to take a walk in a..
The blue sky is how beautiful! / Under the same blue sky is how interesting! / The blue sky has covered so many, many stories about the truth, good ness, beauty, and falsity, badness, ugliness..
In Nature, one of the closest, most intimate teachers of source is the sky.
The clarity and spaciousness of the sky help inspire the realization of an even greater clarity and vastness that lies within you, which is the true, clear essence of Source.
If there are a few clouds in the sky, relax and place your main attention on the emptiness of the sky.
People of all cultures have found the sky's blueness particularly noteworthy.
The belief that the blue sky is a protective shield for life on Earth is not new.
